professional_profile.summary: Graduate Software Developer with a Master of Information Technology (Software Development specialisation) and hands-on experience building full-stack, cloud-deployed applications. Experienced across the full SDLC, including data-intensive systems, automation, and AI-assisted workflows. Strong focus on clean architecture, reliability, and real-world impact.

professional_experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
key_responsibilities: Developed full-stack features using Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, and PostgreSQL
Implemented authentication and role-based access control
Built dashboards, reporting modules, and CSV data workflows
Integrated AI services for automation and matching logic
Worked in Agile sprints with industry mentors
Deployed applications using cloud platforms with CI/CD

professional_experience.title: Website Manager & Web Developer
key_responsibilities: Maintained and extended a production WordPress website
Developed custom plugins and backend features
Implemented CMS workflows for non-technical users
Collaborated with design and marketing teams

professional_experience.title: Web Developer Intern
key_responsibilities: Worked across the full web development lifecycle

key_projects.name: AI Participation Management System
key_projects.description: AI-driven platform for managing student participation and automating project allocation.
responsibilities: Designed CSV enrolment import and matching workflow
Implemented deterministic and fuzzy matching with human-in-the-loop confirmation
Built dashboards and compliance reporting features
Designed append-only event and audit-safe workflows

training_certifications.name: 10-Week Full Stack Developer Live Industry Internship

strengths: Strong problem-solving and system design thinking
Production-level awareness of data quality and auditability
